Title: Exchange student at Georgetown University detained over 'Hamas pr...
Description: The Indian national was detained under the same law as Mahmoud Khalil of Columbia University. His attorneys say the man has no criminal record and has not been charged, and that him and his Palestinian-American wife have a long history of being doxxed

Title: Knesset panel advances Netanyahu coalition plan for political tak...
Description: The proposal to change the composition of the committee that selects Israel's judges has moved forward for approval by the full Knesset. The Attorney General warns it 'casts a heavy political shadow over the judicial system'

Title: IDF October 7 probe: Security squad in Gaza border kibbutz Alumim...
Description: The report reveals that the IDF failed to notify the kibbutz's security officer about Hamas infiltrators. A request to keep the security team in shelters instead of deploying them was approved. This led to the terrorists killing Thai and Nepali workers, as well as Nova rave survivors

Title: Two suspects detained, questioned over Qatari cash paid to Netany...
Description: The two suspects face charges of bribery, fraud, and breach of trust, with a gag order placed on the case. The former spokesperson for Netanyahu claimed he received payment from a foreign entity for state-related work, which is illegal. A senior legal expert told Haaretz the payment could be seen as bribery

Title: A real warning: By firing the Shin Bet chief, Netanyahu is destro...

Title: Peace deal with Armenia could strengthen Azerbaijan in Mideast, W...
Description: The emerging deal appears to be an Armenian surrender, with doubts about its implementation, but both nations stand to gain leadership in the new world order. Meanwhile, Trump's envoy, Witkoff, visited Baku, hinting at potential U.S.-Azerbaijan-Israel cooperation as Azerbaijan also eyes a role in Syria's reconstruction

Title: High-ranking IDF officer loses classified documents in central Is...
Description: Erez Weiner, a Brigadier General (res.) serving at Southern Command during the war, lost the documents in Ramat Gan, where they were subsequently found by a civilian

Title: Netanyahu sacks Shin Bet chief: Why now, and how big is the dange...
Description: Israeli democracy is now in grave danger, and the Supreme Court cannot protect it alone. It's up to Israelis to decide if they'll accept Netanyahu's hostile power-grab – and how far they will go to stop it

Title: The hidden reason behind Netanyahu's ugly, shocking firing of Isr...
Description: Netanyahu is trying to ditch one of the few remaining gatekeepers of Israel's fragile democracy, Trump-style favoring personal loyalty above all else. But there's another reason for why he acted right now

Title: Shin Bet detains, then releases, senior PMO official on suspicion...
Description: The senior official, related to Netanyahu's security detail, was arrested with an activist in the protest movement. Both were both barred from seeing a lawyer while detained. Shin Bet later decided to release them to house arrest

Title: Netanyahu informs Shin Bet chief Ronen Bar that he intends to fir...
Description: Netanyahu said the decision to fire Ronen Bar was made due to 'an ongoing lack of trust,' adding the cabinet will convene to approve his dismissal later this week ■ Bar: Netanyahu's demand for personal loyalty is 'fundamentally flawed,' violates Israeli public's interest

Title: Running with Einav Zangauker, warrior mother of hostage Matan
Description: When people talk about Zangauker, a single mom from Ofakim and once-avowed Netanyahu supporter, one word comes up over and over: 'unlikely.' Unlikely warrior, unlikely leader of the protest movement. But as we circled Defense Ministry HQ, I realized the descriptor doesn't fit

Title: Netanyahu's nightmare is playing out on the streets of Belgrade. ...
Description: Serbia's huge rallies against the government of right-wing populist Aleksandar Vučić greatly concern Israeli PM Netanyahu. His decision on Sunday to fire the head of the Shin Bet increases the possibility of a 'Serbian Moment' in Israel

Title: Israel Police open investigation into ex-Shin Bet chief for alleg...
Description: The police decided not to consult with the Attorney General prior to looking into Nadav Argaman's statements, though it is customary to do so when investigating former senior officials

Title: He was her devoted grandpa. He was also a military governor who t...
Description: In her documentary 'The Governor,' Danel Elpeleg examines the less 'grandfatherly' side of a beloved but complex relative, who served several stints as a military governor who ruled over Arab citizens starting in the '50s

Title: IDF seeks probe into Netanyahu's military secretary for using min...
Description: Haaretz's exclusive reporting last year revealed that PM Netanyahu's military secretary, Maj. Gen. Roman Gofman, allowed a 17-year-old access to confidential information so that he would post it on social media. The teenager was detained for over a year, but Gofman was only reprimanded

Title: It's fun here,' expats visiting Israel say. Fun, but is it worth...
Description: In a country that's sliding down into apartheid, into perpetual war, into fundamentalist fascism, 'fun' is a smokescreen for our sins

Title: Israel Police rescue lion cub and monkey, latest in string of ani...
Description: This is horrific animal abuse that not only endangers the animals but poses a risk to humans,' an official from Israel Nature and Parks Authority said. Police believe some of the animals were smuggled in using drones, which were also used to smuggle in weapons

Title: What would revenge do? Will it bring back Hamza or Youssef?'
Description: For 460 days, Bashir Alziadana fought to return his family members, who were taken hostage alive, but their bodies were returned to Israel by the IDF two months ago. 'People aren't talking enough about what to do instead of revenge,' he said

Title: A Brief History of Purim, the Halloween of Jewish Holidays
Description: What is its origin? When did it begin? Why did many Jews scorn Purim – and is the underlying tale of love, murder and betrayal true?

Title: Israeli pizzerias named among Asia's best for the second year in ...
Description: Haifa-based NeoPolitan achieved the highest placing for an Israeli pizza in the history of the guide, alongside Jerusalem-based Le Piedra, which was named for the second year in a row on a list of the 50 best pizzas in Asia

Title: Yemen's Houthis to resume attacks on Israeli ships until Israel u...
Description: Houthis say they will renew a naval blockade targeting Israeli–owned vessels passing through Yemen's naval regions, in solidarity with Palestinians in the Gaza Strip after Israel froze incoming aid. The Houthis launched more than 100 attacks targeting shipping from November 2023

Title: Yemen's Houthis to resume attacks on Israeli ships until Israel u...
Description: Houthis say they will renew a naval blockade targeting Israeli–owned vessels passing through Yemen's naval regions, in solidarity with Palestinians in the Gaza Strip after Israel froze incoming aid. The Houthis launched more than 100 attacks targeting shipping from November 2023

Title: Will Syria's leader artfully unite the country's clashing minorit...
Description: Ahmad al-Sharaa recognizes the necessity of establishing Syria as a 'country of the majority of its minorities,' signing new agreements with the Kurds and the Druze, but they might end up as nothing more than historical pieces of paper

Description: Ahmad al-Sharaa recognizes the necessity of establishing Syria as a 'country of the majority of its minorities,' signing new agreements with the Kurds and the Druze, but they might end up as nothing more than historical pieces of paper

Title: Israeli soldiers violently assaulted Palestinian brothers. When t...
Description: The two brothers said soldiers beat, spat on, and threw objects at them, leaving one with a broken hand and genital injuries. When their lawyer complained about Israeli military police investigators laughing during the report, she was told they 'were young and couldn't help it'

Title: Freed Israeli hostage: Collapse of cease-fire meant 'humiliation,...
Description: In a TV interview, Omer Wenkert recounted his daily rations of three dates and half a pita, and the nearly 200 days he spent in solitary confinement deep underground. 'I can't stop thinking about them. People are still there, and just as I promised them, I won't rest until they all come home'

Title: Palestinian Authority condemns Hamas-U.S. direct talks, says grou...
Description: Palestinian political sources say the condemnation indicates the depth of the crisis between the PA and Hamas. The PA is also disappointed with Trump's Lebanese adviser, Massad Boulos, who adopted the Israeli government's narrative without mentioning the Palestinian position

Title: Syria's government signs a breakthrough deal with Kurdish-led aut...
Description: Syria's interim government announced the end of a days-long military operation against insurgents loyal to ousted president Bashar Assad, in the worst fighting since the end of the 13-year civil war in December

Title: Witkoff flies to Qatar to push Hamas, Israel to continue with dea...
Description: Israel's political echelon is demanding that Hamas agree to what it refers to as the Witkoff plan, which calls for releasing half of the living hostages – around 10 people – within the next few days, in one or more phases

Title: Doha, Riyadh, Baghdad: How Arafat's private jet is used for secre...
Description: Once used by former Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, today the private jet has a new owner. Bashar Masri, Palestinian-American tycoon and the jet's owner, has reportedly been shuttling Trump's hostage envoy around the region

Title: Anger and distress about military draft in Israel's ultra-Orthodo...
Description: If people start getting arrested [for avoiding the draft], the Haredi elected officials won't be able to continue sitting and joking with Netanyahu,' said a source involved in Haredi politics.

Title: The Houthis, like Iran and Hamas, use us Palestinians as slogans...
Description: Yemen's Houthis have announced that Israel missed the deadline to lift the blockade of Gaza, and that they will target Israeli shipping. But many in the Strip want the Iran-backed group to stop interfering in Palestinian affairs. 'For the Houthis, we're pawns in a larger scheme,' says one

Title: We were told that he was killed, but we still hold on to the hop...

Title: Finding God in Gaza: Why so many Israeli hostages are reconnectin...

Title: Hostages' families give Purim gift baskets with single pita to Is...

Title: Netanyahu has only himself to blame for Trump's decision to negot...
